name: Clockwork Maze
description: A mechanical labyrinth contains moving walls, automated traps, and clockwork guardians that operate on precise timing and complex mechanisms. The mechanical technology and precise craftsmanship can be extremely valuable, while the automated defenses and complex mechanisms create constant danger.
atmosphere: Air hums with gears, springs, and technological marvels sound. Moving walls and clockwork guardians operate with mechanical precision. Skin tingles with presence of automated traps and complex mechanisms. Taste of metal and mechanical precision fills mouth. Weight of automated defenses and constant danger makes heart race with excitement and fear.
